snippet: KURZWEIL--Edith D.,died peacefully on February 6, four days after a stroke. A Holocaust survivor, prolific scholar, and editor, Edith was born in Vienna in 1924. She leaves three children-Vivien Schmidt, Ronald Schmidt and Allen Kurzweil-a brother John Weiss, and a grandson, Maximilian. Funeral services will be held on Tuesday, February 9, 11:15am at "The Riverside," 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue. 1/3
